*	Which building is it? Building 11
*	What is the landed cost of the damages? 11,952.6 AED

*	Also, please provide an incident report as to what happened and how the damages were discovered. Subject: SAJ Damaged Stock - Storage Room #22

 

Dear Shibu,

 

I hope you're doing well.

 

We wanted to inform you that some of SAJ's stock in D3, located in storage room #22 on Floor B2, was unfortunately damaged over the weekend due to a water leak from the AC. Approximately two boxes containing 60 perfume bottles were affected, with an estimated value of around AED 12,000.

 

I’m not sure if this is under your scope, if not could you please loop in the appropriate person who can help reviewing the insurance policy and explore the possibility of reclaiming these costs?

Dear Shibu,

 

I hope you're doing well.

 

We wanted to inform you that some of SAJ's stock in D3, located in storage room #22 on Floor B2, was unfortunately damaged over the weekend due to a water leak from the AC. Approximately two boxes containing 60 perfume bottles were affected, with an estimated value of around AED 12,000.

 

I’m not sure if this is under your scope, if not could you please loop in the appropriate person who can help reviewing the insurance policy and explore the possibility of reclaiming these costs?

 

Thank you!

SOUAD ALKHARRAT​​​​

MANAGER ‑ FINANCE

C.G.R. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES
